CT Vision 1
  • CT Vision
    • 1

To configure CT Vision IR:

  1. Install the CT Vision managed package to your Salesforce organization.

  2. Set up CTM Settings object and required page layouts.

  3. Create the CTM Settings records for working with the CT Mobile app.

  4. Perform general configuration on the Salesforce side.

  5. Add the desired providers and set up a connection.

  6. Add CT Vision to the CT Mobile app.

  7. Add marketing photos and additional information for products to be recognized, configure uploading them to the CT Vision server, and customize the layout for the required Product object.

  8. Specify photo tags.

When the CT Vision IR is configured, work with it in Salesforce and the CT Mobile app.

Integration with the CG Cloud solution is currently not supported.
